price: Hakika walio amini na wakatenda mema, hao ndio bora wa viumbe.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمۡ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡبَرِيَّةِ
footnotes: Hakika wenye kumuamini Mwenyezi Mungu na Mtume wake, na wakatenda vitendo vyema, hao ndio bora ya viumbe kwa itikadi na vitendo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti ulāika hum khayru al-bariyati
